name: Visit to Daxu Ancient Town from Guilin
description:
You will visit the ancient town of Daxu. It is located on the north bank of the Li River, and was founded in the Northern Song Dynasty (960–1126).

Highlights:

Visit the original Daxu Ancient Town, once one of the largest villages in Guangxi
Experience local rural lifestyle and taste delicious local snacks
Tailor-make your own sightseeing itinerary and go sightseeing at your own pace
Well-trained local English-speaking tour guide
Private vehicle
Hotel pickup and drop off

Key Sights: Daxu Ancient Town
